Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 武器屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフってホントに かわいいから大好き！ だから、毎日外で遊んでるの。
Entry.EnglishText: I love Muffmuffs because they're so cute! I come out to play with them everyday.

Entry.JapaneseText: わたし、マフマフが大好き！ お家に連れて行きたいんだけど、 お母さんがダメって言うの……
Entry.EnglishText: I love Muffmuffs! I want to take one home with me, but my mom won't let me...

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフ、戻って来るかな？ みんなと仲良くしたら 帰ってくるかな……
Entry.EnglishText: The Muffmuffs will come back, right? They'll be back when everyone starts getting along again, I'm sure...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……マフマフがいなく なっちゃったよ…… くすん……
Entry.EnglishText: The Muffmuffs are all gone...

Entry.JapaneseText: みんながケンカしたり、 バイラスが出たりするから、 マフマフはイヤに なっちゃったのなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Muffmuffs don't like that everyone is fighting and that these Biruses keep showing up...

Entry.JapaneseText: マフマフが戻って来たの…… でも、前みたいに遊ぼうとすると 逃げちゃうの……
Entry.EnglishText: The Muffmuffs came back... But when I try to play with them like I used to, they run off...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の事、キライに なっちゃったのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like they've grown to hate <Yellow>Humans<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……この音で、またマフマフが 逃げたりしないかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Will this noise make the Muffmuffs run away again?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっとずつだけど、 マフマフとなかよく なってきたの……
Entry.EnglishText: I've grown to be better friends with these Muffmuffs over time...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマも ちょっとずつなかよく なれるよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe Huma and Gajuma will grow to be better friends over time as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: シッコクトリオって おもしろいし、 カッコイイよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Trio are so cool and funny, aren't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしも、そこにいる マフマフにおなまえ、 つけてあげたんだぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I gave the Muffmuffs over there names.

Entry.JapaneseText: 近くにいるのが、 「漆黒のマフちゃん」で 遠くにいるのが……
Entry.EnglishText: The one close to me is called "Dark Muff," and the one over there...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「漆黒のジョージ」だよ！ いいおなまえでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is called "Dark George"! Aren't they lovely names?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街は初めて？ 寒くて驚いたでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Is this your first time in this town? Were you surprised by the cold?

Entry.JapaneseText: バナナが釘を打てるくらいに 凍っちゃうのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's so cold that you could use a banana to drive in a nail.
Entry.Notes: apparently driving nails in with bananas is a way to measure cold?

Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒さんだけじゃない。 我々カレギア軍も街を守るため 全力を尽くしている。
Entry.EnglishText: Not only the Dark Trio, but also the Callegean Army will do all in our power to protect this town.

Entry.JapaneseText: あのかわいいマフマフたちも 必ず守ります！
Entry.EnglishText: We'll keep those cute Muffmuffs safe as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
